items.sentence: When Tom gets drunk, he\'ll eat a lot of things that he wouldn\'t eat when he\'s sober.
Tom offered to carry Mary\'s suitcase, but she told him she wanted to carry it herself.
Tom was charged with drunken driving after he was involved in a car accident in Boston.
Tom wanted to cut down that tree in his front yard, but Mary doesn\'t want it cut down.
I imagine that Tom will eventually find out that Mary has been talking behind his back.
I never for a moment imagined that I would still be doing this kind of thing at my age.
Since Tom is leaving for Boston tomorrow, today is our last chance to give this to him.
The bomb blew Tom\'s house to smithereens. Fortunately, he wasn\'t at home at the time.
I think we should all be worried a little bit about the way Tom has been acting lately.
Tom wears a modified fishing vest to hold all his harmonicas when he performs on stage.
